SEARCH
Package app.apollo.server

Class FileProviderManager

java.lang.Object
app.apollo.server.FileProviderManager
public class FileProviderManager extends Object
Manages file metadata and blocks, coordinating storage operations and persistence.

This class acts as a service layer between the remote file provider and the data access objects (DAOs) for file metadata and blocks. It handles creation, update, retrieval, and deletion of file blocks and metadata.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileProviderManager

      public FileProviderManager(DAOFactory factory)
      Constructs a FileProviderManager with the specified DAOFactory.
      Parameters:
      factory - DAOFactory to obtain DAO instances for metadata and blocks.

  • Method Details

    • setFileBlockCount

      public void setFileBlockCount(Integer userId, String filename, long numBlocks)
      Sets the number of blocks a file contains. If the new count is less than the previous count, removes extra blocks from storage and database.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user owning the file.
      filename - Name of the file.
      numBlocks - New block count.

    • getFileBlockCount

      public long getFileBlockCount(Integer userId, String filename)
      Retrieves the number of blocks for the specified file.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the file owner.
      filename - Name of the file.
      Returns:
      The number of blocks for the file or 0 if metadata not found.

    • uploadBlock

      public void uploadBlock(Integer userId, String filename, Block block)
      Uploads a block for the specified file. Creates file metadata if missing. Stores block data on disk and inserts block info into database.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user uploading the block.
      filename - Name of the file.
      block - Block data and metadata.

    • deleteFile

      public void deleteFile(Integer userId, String filename)
      Deletes the specified file along with all its blocks from both disk and database.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the file owner.
      filename - Name of the file to delete.

    • getChecksums

      public List<String> getChecksums(Integer userId, String filename)
      Retrieves a list of checksums for all blocks of a file.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the file owner.
      filename - Name of the file.
      Returns:
      List of checksums; empty list if file not found.

    • downloadBlock

      public Block downloadBlock(Integer userId, String filename, long blockIndex)
      Downloads a specific block of a file. Reads block data from disk and returns a Block object with its data.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the file owner.
      filename - Name of the file.
      blockIndex - Index of the block to download.
      Returns:
      Block containing the data and metadata; null if not found or error.

    • listFiles

      public List<String> listFiles(Integer userId)
      Lists all filenames owned by the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user.
      Returns:
      List of filenames belonging to the user; empty if none found.
